content.full_text:
James L. Edwards to Maria Davis in Care of Abraham Lincoln, 20 March 1849 You are hereby notified that your claim under the 9th section of the act of February

11, 1847, allowing bounty land or scrip, at the option of the claimant, has been allowed,

and theCommissionerof theGeneral Land Officehas been duly notified thereof.1He will give you further information on the subject in due time.
